data.text:
Boris III (1894-1975) was the Tsar of the Third Bulgarian Empire from 1948 to 1975 during Sanaagian War of Independence, Eritrean War of Independence, Guinean War of Independence and Cameroon Crisis. In his era Bulgaria like Ottoman Empire started to decline and lost colonies. When his father was old he was secretly ruled country.

Boris III Tsar of Bulgaria 10 July 1948-1975 Previous Ferdinand I Successor Simeon II Borned 30 January 1894, Sofia Married Giovanna of Italy (1930-?) Childrens Princess Marie Louise

Simeon II

Death 1975, Sofia

Family[]

In the year 1930, Boris married the Italian Princess Giovanna of Savoy, who became Queen of Bulgaria under the name Joanna. They had two children:
